post:
## Configuration

- CPU - 1 core (2 x E5-2670v3 or 2 x E5-2660v2 on host)

- RAM - 512 MiB RAM

- Storage - 10GB HW RAID 10 (SSD)

- Bandwidth - 512 GiB In + Out, 1Gbps Port

- IPv4 - /32

- IPv6 - /64 *IPv6 support is being refactored, so we may not assign IPv6 address by default, you can requst a /64 via ticket*

[Purchase $5 / mo](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=56)

[Purchase $50 / yr](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=56&billingcycle=annually)

## Datacenter and network

Datacenter: Redcom Khabarovsk

Test IPv4: 185.248.84.233

Test IPv6: 2a0b:4342:4000:233::

Looking Glass: http://ru-khv01.lg.zeptovm.com/

We can provide BGP session and IP announcement service in this region. NRC is 15 USD Per Account.

If you want to deploy AnyCast network using this feature, we also had some nodes in Moscow which have almost the same transit blend (MTS, MegaFon, Rostelecom and TTK). Please open a ticket if you want to purchase in Moscow .

## About us

Misaka Network LLC is a Wyoming registered LLC (Filling ID 2017-000756675).

We are RIPE NCC LIR member and also run our own network AS57695 / AS57578.

## Notes

- We've started to migrate from SolusVM to our in-house panel, so SolusVM access is disabled to avoid inconsistent state. If you need SolusVM features which is missing from client area. Please open a ticket, we're glad to help you.

- Some prefixes (CloudFlare, Google, DigitalOcean and Telegram) were routed via Frankfurt or Tokyo, we can also remove this feature if you don't like it.

- We won't change your IP address if it's blocked after delivery.
